name: Arrows-M
description:
Arrow-M is a pattern-matching game, where the player needs swipe according to the arrow direction in the sequential order. The score will increase when the player keeps on swipe and matched a greater number of arrows within the given limited time, fast is key to get a high score. A unique gameplay experience awaited with colourful icons and enthusiastic background music. Get a chance to show your score to the global by spell out in best score list among top thirty players.

Share and invite anyone wishing to play this game by simply press on the share button. Also, try to challenge them with your score within a similar time limit.

Available only for Android version!!!
